title: cultural_data_Guide__National_Museum_of_Korea
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=or.kr.nationalmuseum.
Application Name: Guide: National Museum of Korea.
Number of Reviews: 255.00.
Application Description: The National Center of Korea is a National Gyeongju Museum, National Gwangju Museum, National Jeonju Museum, National Cheongju Museum, National Buoyo Museum, National Gimhae Museum, National Jeju Museum, National Museum Gongju, National Museum Chuncheon, National Museum Naju, National Museum Jinju, National Museum Daegu, National Museum Iksan and one application for viewers to have a convenient and enjoyable museum viewing Exhibit contents using augmented reality (AR), experiential animation, video, etc. can be used.Using the indoor positioning technology, you can use the exhibition rooms and exhibits automatically for photos, explanations and voice guidance services of exhibits. However, you need to enable location information and Bluetooth function.You can create and use the viewing flow line directly, you can share it and use it the same way.   ※ National Museum of Korea app is compatible with Android 7.0 or later.
Number of Characters in Description: 930.00.
Overall Rate: 3.90.
First Page Reviews: a personal and FREE docent to the museum. You can plan the rooms to visit and save the artefacts that merit further study. Brilliantly connected. Well designed guide app National Museum Korea App This app is awesome. It is the same as the 3000kw audio guide offered by the museum and includes beautiful pictures. Museum in a box for revisiting..
Number of Characters in First Page Reviews: 344.00.
Last Update: 30/01/2020.
Ending Date: 19/03/2021.
Number of Days Since Last Update: 414.00.
App Size: 80.00.
App Installs: 100000.00.
 Version Required: 7.00.
